devdoc.details: Implements meter transactions and consumption on immutable ledger

params.password: The password of the new consumer
params.username: The username of the new consumer

params._serial: The unique ID of the meter
params._startUnitBalance: The base units balance purchased on new meter

addProducer(string,string).details: Save new energy producer on chain

params.password: The password of the new producer
params.username: The username of the new producer

addTransaction(string,string,bytes32,byt.details: save transaction of token loaded to smart meter. This is saved to the meter's transaction history

params._token: Energy token bought for loading. Unique transaction identifier

constructor.details: Initialize contract and set owner as sender

params._rawPassword: The raw password input of consumer from clientside
params._rawUsername: The raw username input of consumer from clientside

getMeterTransactions(string).details: fetch all the token transactions made for a particular meter

params._meterSerial: The id of the meter whose transaction history is required

getMeterTransactions(string).return: _meterTransations An array of transactions mapped by the meterId

getTransaction(string,string).details: fetch details of single meter token Transaction

params._meterSerial: The ID of the meter that owns transaction
params._token: The ID of the transaction to be fetched
